      • getStudentPosition

        protected int getStudentPosition​(String studentId,
                                 List<Student> queue)
        Gets and returns index of the given student in the given queue
        Parameters:
        studentId - id of the student to find in the queue
        queue - queue to find the student in
        Returns:
        int position of the student in the queue. -1 if not present
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException - throws the exception if the student is not present in the employee's queue
